rdf:Description.oops:hasMessage: If you have entered a URI make sure that it is available on-line using, for example, Vapour or Hyperthing.
Make sure that your ontology RDF or OWL code is correct using an RDF validator as http://www.w3.org/RDF/Validator/ or an OWL validator as http://www.mygrid.org.uk/OWL/Validator.
